languages.english-overview:
FluxBB is a free open source forum application designed to be fast, light and user friendly.
FluxBB's code, written in PHP, has a proven track record of stability and security. FluxBB is being actively developed.
FluxBB is released under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE.

ul.li: Free for domestic and commercial use
Distributed under GNU General Public Licence

languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
languages.english-err_no_dbprefix: Could not determine the database prefix
